description.narrative: The project aims at empowering women in low income communities by increasing employment and providing women with machines to sew reusable pads. Each employee will be paid per 500 reusable pad production a month. This will assist the South African government in reducing womens employment rate. The solution is to keep girls in school. To grant government, NPOs and private companies the opportunity to give sanitary items to girls at the most cost effective.

description.narrative: BUSLAB provides innovative transport solutions in Polokwane City. It aims at closing the gap by being an active lead supplier of alternative transport to people in the community. The companys strategy is to build a reputable market share by offering shared taxi as a viable alternative to existing taxicab services. BUSLAB will provide 3-wheelers Tuk-Tuk transport services utilizing computer dispatch to help with timely pick up and quality customer care. The software and hardware systems that will be used will give customers convenience by allowing them to use credit and debit cards in the taxi.
